descriptions.en:
Spawns a ÔÑàHeavy Ammo Brick upon scoring a Weapon Kill after reaching 100% Counter Progress. Counter is only progressed by Weapon Kills.

Ammo Finder Bricks grant 27.5%|60%|100% of a Regular Ammo Brick's Pickup Amount with 1|2|3 Mods equipped. Pickup Amount is determined on Brick Spawn.

Counter Progress on Weapon Kills:
1.1% to 1.33%. Average of 83.5 Kills.

Progress Multipliers on Kills:
‚Ä¢ ÔÑÜPrimary Weapons: 4.25x
‚Ä¢ ÔÑáSpecial Weapons: 1.05x
‚Ä¢ Exotic ÔÑÜPrimary Weapons: further 1.3?x on top of the Primary Multiplier (total of 5.525?‚Å†x)
‚Ä¢ Playing Solo: 1.2?‚Å†x

Eriana's Vow inherits the Exotic Primary Multiplier but is still treated as a Special Weapon.

Ammo Finder Bricks have less variablity compared to Regular Bricks. (i.e. they can't go as far above or under the average ammo amount granted)

Grants 20% Damage Resistance while overcharging a ÓÖÑVoid Grenade with ÓÖÑChaos Accelerant.

Overcharged Grenade Hits grant 2000% [1000%] Additional Base Grenade Regeneration Rate for 1.75 seconds.

4 second cooldown between activations.

ÓÖÑVortex Grenades can proc it twice if enemies get hit by the initial explosion and the last few ticks.

On Class Ability Usage with 1|2+ Mods equipped:
Collects Orbs of Power within 12.5|18.5 meters.

Also collects Motes of Light in Gambit as well as Crests in Supremacy.
Passively increases Stability by 20 but decreases Reload Speed by 20.

Weapon Kills grant 1 Stack of Adrenaline Junkie for 4.5 seconds. Grenade Kills grant all 5 Stacks instantly even if the weapon is stowed.

Adrenaline Junkie benefits:
‚Ä¢ 20 Handling
‚Ä¢ 6.7%|13.3%|20%|26.6%|33.3% increased damage at 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks

Increases Kinetic Weapon Damage while you have active Armor Charges:
‚Ä¢ PVE: 10%|17%|22%|25% increased damage with 1|2|3|4 Mods
‚Ä¢ PVP: 3%|4.5%|5.5%|6% increased damage

The 4th tier of the damage buff is only obtainable through Artifact Perks and Exotic Armor.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

While within 15 metres of an ally:
Grants a Stack of Nano-Munitions every 3 seconds. Maximum of 7 Stacks.

Emptying the Magazine consumes a Stack to refill 25% of it (rounded up). Consuming a Stack restarts the timer for gaining new Stacks.

Readying a Power Weapon consumes all Stacks with each one refilling 25% of your Magazine (rounded up).

After Aiming Down Sights for ü°Ö1.4 seconds without firing, for one shot:
‚Ä¢ 10% increased Aim Assist Falloff Distance
‚Ä¢ Increases Precision Multiplier by 1 (e.g. 1.5xü†ö2.5x)

Timer starts as soon as the ADS input is pressed.

The precision damage of Scout Rifles is decreased by 5% while Box Breathing is active. (This part of the perk is inconsistent and often doesn't get applied)

ü°Ö Activation time is reduced by 0.1 seconds.

Special Ammo Finder Bricks you create also spawn a copy for your allies.

Ammo Bricks spawned this way grant 27.5%|60% of a Regular Ammo Brick's Pickup Amount with 1|2 Mods equipped.

Only usable while on the ground.

Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation. Rift lasts 15 seconds.

Grants a 20% [15%] [Empowering Buff](https://url.d2clarity.com/DamageBuffs) to you and allies inside the Rift.

Only usable while on the ground.

Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation. Rift lasts 15 seconds.

Heals you and allies in the Rift for 40 HP per second.

If at full health, the Rift grants 3 HP of Overshield per second, up to a 15 HP Overshield.
Reloading loads 1 additional round at a time.

Weapon Kills grant Stacks of Sword Logic.

The number of Stacks and the buff duration are tied to the highest [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) killed since activation:
‚Ä¢ Minors: 1 Stack for 5.5 seconds
‚Ä¢ Elites, Players: 2 Stacks for 7.5 seconds
‚Ä¢ Minibosses and Players in their Super: 3 Stacks for 10.5 seconds
‚Ä¢ Bosses: 4 Stacks for 15.5 seconds

Damage increase at 1|2|3|4 Stacks:
15% | 25% [20%] | 35% | 50%

Additional Kills refresh the buff duration to the duration tied to the highest Enemy Rank killed.

The next Weapon Kill within 10 seconds of using your Class Ability spawns an Orb of Power that grants 0.8%|1.1%|1.25%|1.5% Super Energy with 1|2|3|4 Mods equipped. (4 Mods is only achievable through Exotic Armor)

10|5|1|1? second cooldown between activations with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Hits and Kills with your Weapon grant you 'Points'. Hitting Point thresholds grants Stacks of Field Test.

Maximum of 5 Stacks. Buff is only removed on death.

Stat Bonuses at 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks:
‚Ä¢ 3 | 6 | 9 | 12 | 20 Range
‚Ä¢ 5 | 10 | 20 | 35 | 50 Reload Speed
‚Ä¢ ? | ? | ? | ? | 30? Stability
‚Ä¢ ? | ? | ? | ? | ? Handling
‚Ä¢ 5 | 10 | 20 | 35 | 55 Charge Rate (Swords)
‚Ä¢ 5 | 10 | 20 | 30 | 40 Guard Resistance (Swords)

Points required for 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks:
‚Ä¢ ÔÑÜPrimary Weapons: 51|151|351|651|1001
‚Ä¢ ÔÑáSpecial Weapons: 26|76|176|326|501
‚Ä¢ ÔÑàPower Weapons: 11|31|71|131|201

Each Hit grants 1 Point regardless of Weapon Archetype and Enemy Rank. Does not require Direct Hits.

Points granted by Kills are based on [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
‚Ä¢ Tier 1-2 Minors: 1 Point
‚Ä¢ Tier 3-4 Minors, Tier 2+ Elites, and higher: 4 Points
‚Ä¢ Tier 1 Elites: 5 Points
‚Ä¢ Enemy Players: 10 Points

Kill Point Multipliers by Weapon Archetype:
‚Ä¢ ÔÑÜPrimary Weapons and Shotguns: 5x
‚Ä¢ Breech-Loaded Grenade Launchers: 2x

Grants the following benefits for your first shot (of the burst):
‚Ä¢ 20 Aim Assist and 25 Range
‚Ä¢ 5% decreased Accuracy Cone Size
‚Ä¢ 10% decreased Accuracy Cone Growth

ÔÑáSpecial weapons only receive 50% of the benefits. Stats are rounded up.

Firing the weapon prevents the perk from activating for 3.1 seconds.
Breaking a Combatant Shield with the matching Elemental Damage Type grants 1 Stack of Armor Charge.

Passively grants 1 Zoom.

Increasing Zoom has the following effects in ADS:
‚Ä¢ Increased Magnification
‚Ä¢ Increased Aim Assist Falloff Distance
‚Ä¢ Decreased Absolute Recoil
‚Ä¢ Narrowed Accuracy and Aim Assist Cones (size stays the same on-screen)

Only works in PvE game modes.

Ammo Brick Pickups grants an additional 1% of your Total Reserves to ÓÖÄSolar Weapons matching the Ammo Type. This is increased to 10% with Trace Rifles and Swords and to 5% with Xenophage.

Eyes of Tomorrow, and Two-Tailed Fox do not receive any extra ammo on pickups.

Always rounds up to the nearest whole number. Functions the same way regardless of what spawned the Ammo Brick.

Context: normal Ammo Bricks grant 25-33% of your Total Reserves by default.

Class Ability Usage refills ?% of your Magazine (rounded up) from reserves and changes the weapon's element to match your Super Ability until stowed.

Magazine Refill cannot be triggered again without stowing the weapon first.

ü°Ö Passively grants 5 Handling.

Splits off 50% of the weapon's bodyshot damage into an Explosive Payload that deals 30% increased damage in PvE and isn't affected by damage Falloff.

[PvE] Total damage is increased by 15% of the weapon's bodyshot damage. For crits, the overall increase is roughly equal to 15% divided by the Crit Multiplier.

[PvP] Don't want to talk about it... yet.

ü°Ö Passively grants 5 Reload Speed.

Scoring multiple hits lowers the target's damage output by 10% for 5 [3] seconds.

Duration cannot be refreshed.

Hit Requirements by Weapon Type:
‚Ä¢ 3  Hits: Bows, Glaives (both Projectile and Melee), Grenade/Rocket Launchers (Impact and Detonation damage count separately), Sniper Rifles
‚Ä¢ 7 Hits: Scout Rifles
‚Ä¢ 12 Hits: Sidearms
‚Ä¢ 13 Hits: Submachine Guns
‚Ä¢ 14 Hits: Fusion Rifles
‚Ä¢ 16 Hits: Auto Rifles

Scoring multiple hits lowers the target's damage output by 10% for 5 [3] seconds.

Duration cannot be refreshed.

Hit Requirements by Weapon Type:
‚Ä¢ 3  Hits: Bows, Glaives (both Projectile and Melee), Grenade/Rocket Launchers (Impact and Detonation damage count separately), Sniper Rifles
‚Ä¢ 7 Hits: Scout Rifles
‚Ä¢ 12 Hits: Sidearms
‚Ä¢ 13 Hits: Submachine Guns
‚Ä¢ 14 Hits: Fusion Rifles
‚Ä¢ 16 Hits: Auto Rifles
Finishers with no active Armor Charge Stacks grant 1 Stack of Armor Charge.

Weapon Kills grant a Stack of 'Onslaught' for 4.5 seconds. Maximum of 3 Stacks.

Benefits at 1|2|3 Stacks of Onslaught:
‚Ä¢ 16% | 28% | 37% decreased Firing Delay
‚Ä¢ 15 | 25 | 35 Reload Speed

Grants the following to ÓºéStrand Weapons 1 second after readying them:
‚Ä¢ 10|15|18 Reload Speed with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
‚Ä¢ 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier

Grants the following to ÓÖÉArc Weapons 1 second after readying them:
‚Ä¢ 5|8|10 Aim Assist with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
‚Ä¢ 0.9x|0.85x|0.8x Accuracy Cone Size
‚Ä¢ 0.85x|0.75x|0.7x ADS Animation Duration Multiplier

Upon scoring a Precision Kill or 3 kills within 3 seconds of each:
Spawns a ÓºéThreadling on Enemy Death Location.

ü°Ö Passively grants 5 Handling.

Spawns an Orb of Power upon scoring 2 Kills within ? seconds of each with a ÓÖÑVoid or ÓºéStrand Weapon.

Kills within 1 seconds of an activation do not count.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.25%|4.4% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

'Multi-Dodge Ready' appears on the Buff List while within 15 meters of an enemy.

Dodging while Multi-Dodge is ready allows you to chain dodges infinitely for 6 seconds. Additional kills extend the buff duration by 5 seconds, up to the maximum of 11 seconds.

Multi-Dodge Dodges don't activate:
‚Ä¢ ÓÑπWinter's Shroud and ÓºéThreaded Specter Aspects
‚Ä¢ Dynamo, Bomber, Outreach, and Distribution Armor Mods

ÓºéEnsnaring Slam removes the buff after one usage.
Passively grants 10 Accuracy.

Finishing a reload overfills the Magazine from reserves by 10% of the Base Magazine Capacity (rounded up) for each ally within 15 meters.

Overfill amount maxes out at 50%.

Precision Kills create a Large ÓÑπStasis Crystal at the target's location.

[Tier 1-2 Minor and Tier 1 Elite](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) Combatants only spawn a Medium ÓÑπStasis Crystal.

Creating 5 ÓÑπCrystals within ? seconds prevents the perk from activating for 5 seconds.
Precision hits build up Dynamic Charge. Swapping to Arc Seeker mode increases damage and partially reloads the magazine based on the number of charges.
Missing twice within 6 seconds refills 1 round into Magazine from thin air.

Powered Sword Hits grant 3% increased damage for ü°Ö4 seconds. Stacks 10 times for a 30% Buff.

Blocking removes all stacks. Wolfpack Round Hits also count as Powered Sword Hits.

ü°Ö Buff duration is increased by 0.5 seconds.

Missing has a chance to refund 1 ammo into the magazine based on the ammo type:
‚Ä¢ ÔÑÜPrimary Weapons: ü°Ö40%
‚Ä¢ ÔÑáSpecial and ÔÑàPower Weapons: ü°Ö25%

ü°Ö Ammo Refund chance is increased by an additive 5%.

Upon scoring a set percentage of the Magazine Capacity as hits within ? seconds of each:
Fires a Tracking Rocket that matches Weapon's Elemental Damage Type.

Rockets deal 22.4 [14] impact and 24 [15] explosive damage on hit and inherit the weapon's [Combatant Damage Scaling](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatant-scaling). On non-primary weapons, the rockets receive and additional damage increase.

% of Magazine Capacity as hits required and the Additional Damage Increase by weapon archetype:
‚Ä¢ Hand Cannons, Pulse Rifles, Submachine Guns: 45% Magazine Capacity \\ 0% increased damage (Baseline)
‚Ä¢ Sniper Rifles: 50%? \\ 100%
‚Ä¢ Grenade Launchers: 30% \\ 25%
‚Ä¢ Machine Guns: 25% \\ 50%
‚Ä¢ Fusion Rifles, Shotguns: ?% \\ 150%

Further hits do not provide activation progress for 1 second after activation.

Precision Kills cause targets to explode, dealing up to 123.89 [95.3] elemental damage in a 4.5 meter radius.

Explosions inherit the weapon's [Combatant Damage Scaling](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatant-scaling).

ü°Ö Passively grants 5 Reload Speed.

Increases damage against shielded targets:
‚Ä¢ ü°Ö140% increase against PVE Combatant Overshields
‚Ä¢ ü°Ö55% increase against PVE Combatant Elemental Shields and Barrier Champion Shields
‚Ä¢ 20% increase against Player Overshields and for bodyshots against Players with ÓºéWoven Mail

Notable Combatant Overshields include Shadow Legion [Tech Pack](https://www.destinypedia.com/Tech_Pack) and Lucent Moth Overshields. They are indicated with a glowing outline around the targets as well as a small blue health bar under the normal one.

ü°Ö Damage Buff is increased: 125%‚Å†ü†ö‚Å†140%, 50%‚Å†ü†ö‚Å†55%, 20%‚Å†ü†ö‚Å†?‚Å†%.

Scoring 2 to 3 ÓÑπStasis Kills within 10 seconds of each grants 1 Stack of ÓÑπStasis Weapon Surge for 11 [6] seconds. Maximum of 4 Stacks. ÓÑπStasis Kills while at 4 Stacks refresh the buff's duration.

Replaces Barricade with Glacial Guard with a cooldown matching Towering Barricade's.

On Glacial Guard Cast:
‚Ä¢ Grants Shielded buff for 20 seconds
‚Ä¢ Grants 4 Stacks of ÓÑπStasis Weapon Surge for 11 [6] seconds
‚Ä¢ Applies 40 ÓÑπSlow Stacks to PVE Combatants within 7 meters

Shielded:
‚Ä¢ Grants a 100 HP Overshield that provides 62.5% Damage Resistance in PVE (breaking this overshield removes the buff)
‚Ä¢ Prevents sprinting, using jump abilities, and sliding
‚Ä¢ Prevents Class Ability Energy gains while active
‚Ä¢ Taking damage refreshes the buff duration
‚Ä¢ Class Ability activation removes the buff

Glaive Melee Kills load 1 Ammo into the Magazine from reserves. Can overfill the Magazine up to double the normal capacity.

While within 15 meters of 3 enemies:
Grants 50 Reload Speed and 100% increased Glaive Melee Damage.

Glaive Projectile Kills cause enemies to explode, dealing up to 350 [101] weapon-matching elemental damage in a 4? meter radius.

Sliding refills 15% of the Magazine (rounds up) and grants ü°Ö22 Range and Stability for your next shot (of the burst) within 2.5 seconds.

0.3 second cooldown after activation but can activate multiple times during a slide.  Buff is removed on stow.

ü°Ö Stat bonuses are increased by 2?.

Grants the following benefits if you have not dealt or received damage in the last 5 seconds:
‚Ä¢ 20 Range and 20 Handling
‚Ä¢ 15% decreased Draw Time on Bows
‚Ä¢ 10.78% increased damage against PvE Combatants. Linear Fusion Rifles only receive an 8.88% damage increase.

Deactivates 2 seconds after exchanging damage.

Grants a 0.8x|0.75x|0.7x Ready/Stow Animation Duration Multiplier to ÓÑπStasis Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stow Animation Duration cannot be reduced below what it would be at 100 Handling.

Precision Hits decrease Draw Time by 25% for 3 seconds.

Buff is removed on stow.

Refills Magazine from reserves upon dropping to 30% Shield Health. Can activate while stowed.

Grants 50 Handling and a 0.95x Ready/Stow Animation Duration Multiplier while at or below 30% Shield Health.

Buff lingers for 1 second once the condition is no longer met.

Grants the following for 7 seconds upon breaking an enemy's shield or destroying a [Vehicle or Construct](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
‚Ä¢ 40 Reload Speed
‚Ä¢ 0.95x Reload Duration Multiplier
‚Ä¢ 0.9x Draw Time Multiplier
Passively grants 10 Blast Radius.

Passively grants 20 Airborne Effectiveness.

Grants Peregrine Strike after sprinting for 2 seconds and being airborne for 0.5 seconds. Buff is removed upon touching the ground.

Peregrine Strike increases the impact damage of Shoulder Charge Melee Abilities by 225%.

Against [Minibosses](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) (inlcuding Champions and Tormentors), the buff is increased to 1000% and refunds your Melee Ability charge on hit.

Provides no benefits when hitting ÓÑπFrozen enemies.

Powered Melee Kills (requires consumption of an ability charge) and Finishers grant ÓÖÑInvisibility and restore Health.

Invisibility Duration and restored Health are based on [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
‚Ä¢ Minors: 6.8 seconds | 100 HP restored
‚Ä¢ Elites, Enemy Players: 9.8 seconds | ? HP restored
‚Ä¢ Minibosses: 12.8 seconds | 200 HP restored
‚Ä¢ Bosses: 13.3 seconds | 200 HP restored

The duration of ÓÖÑInvisibility granted by Finishers is 3 seconds longer. ÓÖÑEcho of Persistence increases ÓÖÑInvisibility duration by 41.5%.

Upon sliding after sprinting for at least 1.5 seconds with your Class Ability fully charged:
Projects a 180¬∞ frontal shield that reflects all incoming projectiles for 0.45 seconds.

Reflected projectiles deal 50% increased damage.

After shield deactivation, 2% Class Ability energy is drained for every point of damage reflected.

Currently partially bugged and does not drain Class Ability Energy for projectiles reflected at the end of your slide.

Scoring multiple Hits against enemies within 5 seconds of each spawns an Orb of Power that grants 0.8% Super Energy.

Does not require Direct Hits. Hit counter persists through stow.

Hit requirements for activation:
‚Ä¢ Bows: 5 Hits
‚Ä¢ Swords: 10 Hits
‚Ä¢ Other: 67% of Magazine Size rounded down + 2

"Buffed Hits" grant 1 Stack of Rapid Hit for 2 seconds. Maximum of 5 Stacks.

"Buffed Hits" refer to any "Yellow Number" Hits such as Precision Hits or Hits against debuffed targets.

Benefits at 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks:
‚Ä¢ 2|12|14|18|25 Stability
‚Ä¢ 5|30|35|42|60 Reload Speed
‚Ä¢ 0.99x|0.96x|0.95x|0.945x|0.92x Reload Duration Multiplier

Scoring multiple Weapon Kills within 8 seconds of each causes your last-killed target to explode and create a Radiolaria Pool at their location. Stowing the weapon resets the Kill Counter.

Explosion deals up to 67.5 [?] damage in a 3? meter radius.

Radiolaria Pool information:
‚Ä¢ Deals 15 [?] ÓÖÉArc damage every 0.65 seconds
‚Ä¢ Lasts for ? seconds (3? damage ticks)
‚Ä¢ Inherits the weapon's [Combatant Damage Scaling](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatant-scaling) and any weapon damage buffs

Activation Progress based on [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
Minors: 34% | Elites and higher: 100% | Players: ?%

Passively grants 30 Magazine Size stat. (Identical to Extended Mag)

While Magazine is at or above maximum capacity:
Grants 25% increased damage and causes enemies to explode on death, dealing 162.5 damage in a ? meter radius.

Explosions inherit the weapon's [Combatant Damage Scaling](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatant-scaling) and deal 30% increased damage if triggered with a Linear Fusion Rifle.

ü°Ö Passively grants 5 Stability.

While Crouched:
‚Ä¢ 30 Handling and 20 Stability
‚Ä¢ -40% Accuracy Cone Size
‚Ä¢ -17% Accuracy Cone Growth
‚Ä¢ -80% horizontal Recoil

Effects are halved on Fusion Rifles (decimals are rounded up).

Weapon Kills grant a Stack of Rampage for ü°Ö5 seconds. Maximum of 3 Stacks.

Damage increase at 1|2|3 Stacks: 10%|21%|33.1%

ü°Ö Buff Duration is increased by 0.5 seconds.

While Aiming Down Sights with Weapons matching your Subclass Element:
Grants 25%|30%|35% Flinch Resistance with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stacks multiplicatively with other Flinch Resistance sources.
Passively grants 10 Range.
[Alternate Weapon Action]  : Swap to a longer, more powerful burst.

While Aiming Down Sights with ÓÖÉArc Weapons:
Grants 25%|30%|35% Flinch Resistance with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stacks multiplicatively with other Flinch Resistance sources.

Grants the following to ÓÖÄSolar Weapons 1 second after readying them:
‚Ä¢ 5|8|10 Aim Assist with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
‚Ä¢ 0.9x|0.85x|0.8x Accuracy Cone Size
‚Ä¢ 0.85x|0.75x|0.7x ADS Animation Duration Multiplier

After scoring a kill or multiple Precision Hits within 5 seconds of each with a different weapon:
Grants the 'Cascade Point Ready' buff for 5 seconds.

Readying the weapon while Cascade Point Ready is active reduces Firing Delay for ü°Ö2.75 seconds.

Firing Delay is reduced by 30% on SMGs and Machine Guns and by 40% on other archetypes.

Activation progress on Precision Hits:
‚Ä¢ Bows, Linear Fusion/Sniper Rifles, Shotguns: 50%
‚Ä¢ Hand Cannons, Sidearms, Scout Rifles: 17.5%
‚Ä¢ Auto/Trace/Pulse Rifles, SMGs, Machine Guns: 8%

ü°Ö Buff duration is increased by 0.25 seconds.

Direct Weapon Hits grants a Stack of Precision Instrument for 1.25 seconds (2.1 seconds on weapons with a Draw/Charge Time).

Maximum of 6 Stacks. Missing removes all Stacks.

Precision Damage Increase at 1|2|... Stacks:
ü°Ö5% | 10% | 15% | 20% | 25% | 30%

ü°Ö Precision Damage Buff is increased by 20%.

After stowing ÓÑπStasis Weapons:
Begins to refill 10%|10%|15% of the Stowed Weapon's Magazine from reserves every 2.5|2|2 seconds with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Does not work with Breech-Loaded Grenades Launchers and Rocket Launchers.

While at/above 50% of the Base Magazine Capacity:
Direct Hits apply 50 ÓÑπSlow Stacks for 4 [1.5] seconds (8 [2] with ÓÑπWhisper of Durance) to enemies within 4 meters of the target.

Rapid-Fire Fusion Rifles only apply 40 ÓÑπSlow Stacks.

Only activates once per shot/burst.

ü°Ö Passively grants 5 Stability.

Grants the following on Weapon Kills for 5 seconds:
‚Ä¢ 15% increased damage
‚Ä¢ Maximized Movement Speed

Remains active even if stowed.

Scoring multiple hits lowers the target's damage output by 10% for 5 [3] seconds.

Duration cannot be refreshed.

Hit Requirements by Weapon Type:
‚Ä¢ 3  Hits: Bows, Glaives (both Projectile and Melee), Grenade/Rocket Launchers (Impact and Detonation damage count separately), Sniper Rifles
‚Ä¢ 7 Hits: Scout Rifles
‚Ä¢ 12 Hits: Sidearms
‚Ä¢ 13 Hits: Submachine Guns
‚Ä¢ 14 Hits: Fusion Rifles
‚Ä¢ 16 Hits: Auto Rifles
Powered Melee Hits make you and allies within 8 meters ÓÖÄRadiant for 8 seconds (12 with ÓÖÄEmber of Solace).

Targets killed by ÓÖÄSolar Supers ÓÖÄIgnite and spawn a ÓÖÄFiresprite at their location.

Deadshot Golden Gun refunds 1 ammo per kill.

Note: ÓÖÄWell of Radiance makes all of the caster's Weapon Damage count as Super Ability Damage so ÓÖÄSolar Weapons Kills will also count as ÓÖÄSolar Super Kills.

ÓÖÄSolar Weapon Kills grant a Stack of Ember of Tempering for 8 seconds to you and allies within 12.5 meters.

ÓÖÄEmber of Tempering grants the following benefits:
‚Ä¢ 10|20|30 Recovery at 1|2|3 Stacks
‚Ä¢ 20 Airborne Effectiveness
‚Ä¢ ÓÖÄSolar Weapon Kills spawn a ÓÖÄFiresprite

ÓÖÄIgnitions apply 40 ÓÖÄScorch Stacks (60 with ÓÖÄEmber of Ashes) to enemies damaged by the explosion.

Does not apply to the ÓÖÄIgnited enemy.

Applying certain buffs to allies grants 400% Additional Base Grenade, Melee, and Class Ability Regeneration Rate for 6 [3] seconds.

Activation Triggers:
‚Ä¢ Granting the ÓÖÄCure, ÓÖÄRadiant, or ÓÖÄRestoration ÓÖÄSolar subclass buffs to allies
‚Ä¢ Healing (from most sources), or reviving allies

Will NOT trigger ÓÖÄEmber of Benevolence:
Empowering Rifts, Mods, Crest of Alpha Lupi's Healing Pulse, and Aeon Sect of Vigor's Healing

Grants 400% Additional Base Class Ability Regeneration Rate for 3 seconds upon applying ÓÖÄScorch to enemies that are not currently ÓÖÄScorched.

Will not activate if the enemy dies from the hit that would have applied ÓÖÄScorch.

ÓÖÄSolar Kills extend the duration of ÓÖÄRestoration and ÓÖÄRadiant effects up to the maximum of 15 seconds.

Scoring a ÓÖÄSolar Kill while ÓÖÄRestoration's or ÓÖÄRadiant's timer is above 15 seconds will lower it back down to 15 seconds.

Seconds added based on [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
‚Ä¢ Tier 1 (T1) Minors: 1.5s
‚Ä¢ T2 Minors, T1 Elites: 2.25s
‚Ä¢ T3 Minors, T2 Elites, Enemy Players: 3s
‚Ä¢ T4 Minors, T3 Elites, and higher: 6s

Grants ÓÖÄSolar Super projectiles stronger tracking.

Only affects ÓÖÄBlade Barrage, ÓÖÄDaybreak, and ÓÖÄSong of Flame? projectiles.

ÓÖÄRestoration and ÓÖÄRadiant effects applied to you last 50% longer.

Specific increases from ÓÖÄEmber of Solace for ÓÖÄRestoration and ÓÖÄRadiant sources can be found in their descriptions.

ÓÖÄIgnition Kills grant Grenade Energy based on the [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) of the killed targets:
‚Ä¢ Tier 1 (T1) Minors: 8%
‚Ä¢ T2 Minors, T1 Elites: 12.25%
‚Ä¢ T3 Minors, T2 Elites: 16.5%
‚Ä¢ Players: 20.75%
‚Ä¢ T4 Minors, T3 Elites, and higher: 25%

Successive Hits within 0.2 seconds of each grant a ramping Damage Buff after scoring 12.5% of the Magazine Capacity as hits (20% on SMGs). Missing deactivates the buff.

Stacks displayed on-screen are only visual aides, the buff [ramps up with each shot](https://url.d2clarity.com/PvETargetLock) once active. Reaches maximum strength at 5 Stacks.

% of the Magazine Capacity as Hits required for each Visual Stack: 12.5%|35.5%|54.5%|74.5%|110.33%
